overview: This is a tribute to my hometown : Le Creusot and its industrial landscape. It's a Super-8 one-shot movie of Le Creusot's industrial estate. This place is now in decline though having been the main workplace in town for a long time. Since the latest economical up-and-downs, this place has now turned into some kind of no-man's-land. The spirit of past workers, who helped rising the metallurgic industries, is haunting the soundtrack.
title: It's a done deal
